item.title: After 40 years on the run, escaped prisoner located and caught
item.description: A man who escaped a Puerto Rican prison nearly 40 years ago was taken into custody in Florida, according to the Lee County Sheriff's Office.

item.title: How slain Las Vegas journalist may have helped capture his own killer
item.description: Crucial DNA evidence found under the fingernails of reporter Jeff German led investigators to Robert Telles, the man charged with killing him.
